title: FAQ
subtitle: Questions you might have and our answers.

questions.question: How long does it take to build a website?
questions.answer: A standard business website takes 2-3 weeks, while an E-Commerce site takes 4-6 weeks. Custom Systems take about 6-8 weeks. We provide you with a progress update every week.

questions.question: What about pricing? Will it fit my budget?
questions.answer: A simple Landing Page starts from Rs. 50,000. A full website (5-10 pages) ranges between Rs. 150,000 - 300,000. We have flexible payment plans. Contact us, and we will create a solution that fits your budget perfectly.

questions.question: Is the website speed reliable?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We use the latest technologies like Next.js. We provide you with an SEO Optimized website that loads in under 2 seconds. Hosting and SSL for the first year are completely free.

questions.question: How does maintenance work?
questions.answer: All maintenance is free for the first 3 months after handover. Afterward, we handle updates and security under a very affordable annual package. You don't need to worry about technical issues.

questions.question: What is the benefit of AI technology for my business?
questions.answer: AI Chatbots can answer customers 24/7, and AI Content Generation can quickly create content for social media. This saves your time and can reduce costs by about 70%.

questions.question: Why should I trust Yaksen?
questions.answer: We are a Colombo-based agency with over 2 years of experience, serving 25+ leading organizations like Frulora and IN HUMAN. Check our Portfolio and customer reviews. Talk to us before starting work to build trust.
